CloverPHPUnitResultFormatter

Extends \PHPUnitResultFormatter

Prints Clover XML output of the test

author

Michiel Rook mrook@php.net
version

$Id: 07b0bdd8f6adb167b753d21663c339565e807e70 $

since 2.4.0
